accountInfo.privateKeyNoBackupPhrase: This account was imported using private key, so there's no secret phrase to copy

backupSeed.backupCarefully: Please carefully write down these 15 words or copy them

network.disabled: You cannot change the network settings during this operation

confirmBackup.selectWord: Please, tap each word in the correct order

deleteAccount.warn: Deleting an account will lead to its irretrievable loss!

errorPage.resetDescription: After this action we delete all secondary information (e.g. favorite tokens). Also you will need to Log In once again.
errorPage.title: Something went wrong

exportKeystore.chooseAccountsDesc: Select which accounts you want to export. They will be encrypted and exported into a Keystore file
exportKeystore.chooseContactsDesc: Select which address you want to export. They will be encrypted and exported into a Keystore file
exportKeystore.warningModalDesc: Ledger and Email accounts cannot be exported
exportKeystore.passwordVerifyDesc: Please enter your Keeper password to confirm that it's really you
exportKeystore.passwordVerifyImportantNote: <attention>Attention:</attention> this password will also be used to encrypt the resulting file. If you forget it, you won't be able to restore your accounts.

forgotPassword.attentionMessage: To reset the password, you need to delete all accounts from Keeper Wallet, set a new password, and import your accounts again.
forgotPassword.warningMessage: If you have not saved secret phrases, private keys, or the Keystore file, then you will not be able to recover access to your accounts.
forgotPassword.continueMessage: To continue, type this into the field below

importEmail.importEmailDesc: Connect an Email account created on WX Network

importSeed.encodedSeedLengthError: Secret phrase in base58 cannot be shorter than {{minLength}} characters
importSeed.invalidPrivateKeyLengthError: Private key must consist of {{length}} bytes
importSeed.plainTextPlaceholder: Your secret phrase is the 15 words you saved when creating your account
importSeed.seedIsAddressError: It's an account address, not a secret phrase. Secret phrase usually consists of 15 words
importSeed.seedIsAliasError: It's an alias, not a secret phrase. Secret phrase usually consists of 15 words
importSeed.seedIsPublicOrPrivateKeyError: An account with a secret phrase like that is vulnerable. May be you meant to <switchTab>use a private key</switchTab>?
importSeed.seedLengthError: Secret phrase cannot be shorter than {{minLength}} characters
importSeed.title: Import using secret

info.keepUp: Keeper Wallet is the safest way to interact with third-party web resources with Waves-integrated functionality or DApps. Using Keeper Wallet, you can sign transactions and remain safe from malicious sites.

ledgerErrors.unknown: Could not connect to Ledger. Please try again
ledgerErrors.usedBySomeOtherApp: Seems like Ledger is already used by another application. Close all applications that may use Ledger and try again.

newAccount.acceptTerms: I have read and agree with the

sign.signAccessInfo: The application will have access to your Waves address. Keeper Wallet will not expose your secret phrase or private key. Never enter your secret phrase on any website you are redirected to.

swap.priceImpactTooltip: The difference between the exchanger price and estimated price due to trade size.

swap.transactionFeeTooltip: Network fee for the smart contract invocation
